headline: American Water Charitable Foundation Continues Partnership with National Urban League
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., December 02, 2024--The American Water Charitable Foundation, a 501(c)(3) organization established by American Water, the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced today that it awarded a $260,000 Corporate Strategic grant to the National Urban League, supporting the Affiliate Movement. Funding will enhance workforce development initiatives that help close the equality gap for African Americans and other historically underserved groups throughout

headline: American Water Works : West Virginia American Water Announces Source Water Protection Video P...
summary: CHARLESTON, W.Va. - West Virginia American Water announced today the premiere of its Source Water Protection video highlighting improvements and advancements the company has made since January 2014. ...
